keyword: how many calories are in a bag of popcorn
title: How Many Calories Are in a Bag of Popcorn?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a bag of popcorn, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for microwave or air-popped styles.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Bag of Popcorn?
assumptions: Standard 94g microwave popcorn bag, butter flavor, fully popped (3 servings of ~31g each); includes artificial butter flavoring.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, bag size, popping method, and added toppings. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard butter-flavored microwave popcorn bag contains about 450 calories.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp melted butter after popping

faqs.q: How many calories are in a bag of microwave popcorn?
faqs.a: About 450 kcal for a standard 94g butter-flavored bag.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories for air-popped popcorn?
faqs.a: Air-popped plain popcorn is lower at ~240 kcal per similar volume bag.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a bag of butter popcorn?
faqs.a: Around 30 g total fat, mostly from the butter flavoring.

faqs.q: Does bag size affect popcorn calories?
faqs.a: Yes; smaller bags (~50g) have ~200-250 kcal, larger theater sizes up to 1,000+ kcal.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a bag of popcorn?
faqs.a: Yes, about 42 g carbs per bag, with 6 g fiber from the corn kernels.
